Dress Code

Smart traditional golf attire required on course and in clubhouse

âœ“ Allowed

  • â€¢ Collared golf shirts
  • â€¢ Golf trousers/chinos
  • â€¢ Golf shorts (tailored, knee-length)
  • â€¢ Golf shoes with soft spikes
  • â€¢ Traditional golf attire
  • â€¢ Sweaters and cardigans

âœ— Not Allowed

  • â€¢ T-shirts or vests

  • â€¢ Tracksuit bottoms
  • â€¢ Football shirts
  • â€¢ Flip-flops or sandals
  • â€¢ Metal spikes

Note: The dress code applies to all areas of the club including the course, practice areas, and clubhouse. Smart casual attire is acceptable in the bar and dining areas.

About the Club

Established in 1892, Heaton Moor Golf Club is a member-owned club offering championship golf in a beautiful parkland setting.
